chefmod:Accelerant.NAME: Accelerant
chefmod:Accelerant.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. Any cards remaining in your hand at the end of turn are Exhausted. NL Exhaust
chefmod:Accelerant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw cards until your hand is full. Half the cards remaining in your hand at the end of turn are Exhausted. NL Exhaust

chefmod:AcidCloud.NAME: Acid Cloud
chefmod:AcidCloud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If the last card played cost 0, Apply !M! Vulnerable to all enemies.

chefmod:AlchemistForm.NAME: Alchemist Form
chefmod:AlchemistForm.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, convert !M! gold into a random potion if you have an empty potion slot. NL Non-minion enemies give 15 gold when defeated.

chefmod:AnotherRound.NAME: Another Round
chefmod:AnotherRound.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, return 1 card that costs 0 to your hand from your discard pile.
chefmod:AnotherRound.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Each turn, return 1 card that costs 0 to your hand from your discard pile.

chefmod:BalancedFormula.NAME: Balanced Formula
chefmod:BalancedFormula.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Move a 0 cost card from your draw pile and from your discard pile to your hand.

chefmod:BeatDown.NAME: Beat Down
chefmod:BeatDown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Place this card on top of your draw pile if your hand is not empty.

chefmod:BlindingMist.NAME: Blinding Mist
chefmod:BlindingMist.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy in combat.

chefmod:BottomlessFlask.NAME: Bottomless Flask
chefmod:BottomlessFlask.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! of 10 potion cards. Replace this card permanently with your choice.

chefmod:Brandish.NAME: Brandish
chefmod:Brandish.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. Discard all Skills drawn this way.

chefmod:Bribery.NAME: Bribery
chefmod:Bribery.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you would lose HP, pay 1 gold to lose !M! less.

chefmod:BrokenBeakers.NAME: Broken Beakers
chefmod:BrokenBeakers.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all Enemies. Reduce this card's damage by !M! this combat.

chefmod:Catalyze.NAME: Catalyze
chefmod:Catalyze.DESCRIPTION: Use an Energy Tonic and a Swift Tonic. NL Exhaust
chefmod:Catalyze.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Use an Energy Potion and a Swift Tonic. NL Exhaust

chefmod:CausticBarrier.NAME: Caustic Barrier
chefmod:CausticBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add a *Distill to your hand.

chefmod:ChainReaction.NAME: Chain Reaction
chefmod:ChainReaction.DESCRIPTION: Each turn, shuffle a *Reaction into your draw pile.
chefmod:ChainReaction.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Each turn, shuffle a *Reaction into your draw pile.

chefmod:ChemicalRage.NAME: Chemical Rage
chefmod:ChemicalRage.DESCRIPTION: Each time you use a Potion, deal !M! Damage to all enemies.

chefmod:ChemicalShroud.NAME: Chemical Shroud
chefmod:ChemicalShroud.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. This costs 1 less for each potion used this combat.

chefmod:ChemicalSpill.NAME: Chemical Spill
chefmod:ChemicalSpill.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL chefmod:Catalyze: Gain !B! block.

chefmod:ChemicalWeapons.NAME: Chemical Weapons
chefmod:ChemicalWeapons.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Add a random *Tonic card to your hand.

chefmod:ChokingPowder.NAME: Choking Powder
chefmod:ChokingPowder.DESCRIPTION: The target takes !M! damage each time you play a card this turn.

chefmod:Collect.NAME: Collect
chefmod:Collect.DESCRIPTION: Collect a chefmod:Reagent from an enemy. Add a *Distill to your hand. NL Exhaust
chefmod:Collect.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Collect a chefmod:Reagent from an enemy. Add a *Distill to your hand. NL Exhaust

chefmod:Contingency.NAME: Contingency
chefmod:Contingency.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Choose a card from your draw pile and move it to the top of your draw pile.

chefmod:CrossReference.NAME: Cross-Reference
chefmod:CrossReference.DESCRIPTION: Move X skills from your draw pile to your hand. They cost 0 this turn.
chefmod:CrossReference.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Move X + 1 skills from your draw pile to your hand. They cost 0 this turn.

chefmod:DigDeep.NAME: Dig Deep
chefmod:DigDeep.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. If the last card played cost 0, gain [E]

chefmod:Discombobulate.NAME: Discombobulate
chefmod:Discombobulate.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL chefmod:Catalyze: Exhaust this card and remove !M! Strength from the target.

chefmod:EmptyBottle.NAME: Empty Bottle
chefmod:EmptyBottle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. When you use a potion, move this from the discard pile to your hand.

chefmod:EquivalentExchange.NAME: Equivalent Exchange
chefmod:EquivalentExchange.DESCRIPTION: The first !M! cards played each turn are Exhausted and replaced with a random card.

chefmod:ExothermicReaction.NAME: Exothermic Reaction
chefmod:ExothermicReaction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If the last card played cost 0, another card costs 0 this turn.

chefmod:Experimentation.NAME: Experimentation
chefmod:Experimentation.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Rotate your rightmost chefmod:Reagent to the far left. If you have collected 3 *reagents, shuffle a *Prototype into your draw pile.

chefmod:ExplosiveReaction.NAME: Explosive Reaction
chefmod:ExplosiveReaction.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Sacrifice your rightmost chefmod:Reagent to do double damage.

chefmod:FlareUp.NAME: Flare Up
chefmod:FlareUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Deal !M! more Damage for each potion played this combat.

chefmod:FlashPowder.NAME: Flash Powder
chefmod:FlashPowder.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. NL chefmod:Catalyze: Draw !M! card.

chefmod:Fuel.NAME: Fuel
chefmod:Fuel.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a *Reaction into your draw pile. NL Gain !B! Block.

chefmod:FuelCell.NAME: Fuel Cell
chefmod:FuelCell.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain [E] [E] NL Reduce energy gained from this card by 1 this combat.

chefmod:HazardousMaterials.NAME: Hazardous Materials
chefmod:HazardousMaterials.DESCRIPTION: Apply X chefmod:Toxic. NL chefmod:Catalyze: And X chefmod:Infection. NL Exhaust
chefmod:HazardousMaterials.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply X chefmod:Toxic. NL chefmod:Catalyze: And X chefmod:Infection. NL Exhaust

chefmod:HazardousWaste.NAME: Hazardous Waste
chefmod:HazardousWaste.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! chefmod:Slimed. NL chefmod:Catalyze: Exhaust this card and permanently increase chefmod:Slimed by 1.
chefmod:HazardousWaste.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate NL Apply !M! chefmod:Slimed. NL chefmod:Catalyze: Exhaust this card and permanently increase chefmod:Slimed by 1.

chefmod:Hoarder.NAME: Hoarder
chefmod:Hoarder.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! additional chefmod:Reagent slot. Each turn, collect a random *Reagent.
chefmod:Hoarder.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! additional chefmod:Reagent slots. Each turn, collect a random *Reagent.

chefmod:IronFist.NAME: Iron Fist
chefmod:IronFist.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL chefmod:Catalyze: Strength affects this !M! times.

chefmod:IronFlesh.NAME: Iron Flesh
chefmod:IronFlesh.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.

chefmod:IronHeart.NAME: Iron Heart
chefmod:IronHeart.DESCRIPTION: When you play a card that costs 0, gain !M! Temporary Dexterity.

chefmod:LabJournal.NAME: Lab Journal
chefmod:LabJournal.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Your *Prototype cards cost 0 this combat. NL Exhaust
chefmod:LabJournal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your *Prototype cards cost 0 this combat. NL Exhaust

chefmod:LeftoverSpecimen.NAME: Leftover Specimen
chefmod:LeftoverSpecimen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose 1 of 3 random chefmod:Reagents to collect. NL Exhaust
chefmod:LeftoverSpecimen.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Choose 1 of 3 random chefmod:Reagents to collect.

chefmod:MicrobeSpray.NAME: Microbe Spray
chefmod:MicrobeSpray.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! chefmod:Infection to all enemies. NL Exhaust

chefmod:OneTwoPunch.NAME: One-Two Punch
chefmod:OneTwoPunch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If the last card played cost 0, play this twice.

chefmod:PortableLab.NAME: Portable Lab
chefmod:PortableLab.DESCRIPTION: Consume any leftover energy after each turn. When !M! energy is consumed, add a *Potion *Card to your hand.

chefmod:PotentialEnergy.NAME: Potential Energy
chefmod:PotentialEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal NL Whenever you gain Strength or Dexterity, gain !M! more.
chefmod:PotentialEnergy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you gain Strength or Dexterity, gain !M! more.

chefmod:PrivateReserves.NAME: Private Reserves
chefmod:PrivateReserves.DESCRIPTION: Each time you use a Potion, gain !M! block.

chefmod:QuickStep.NAME: Quick Step
chefmod:QuickStep.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you've played less than !M! cards this turn, draw a card.

chefmod:RefinedProcess.NAME: Refined Process
chefmod:RefinedProcess.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage !M! times. NL chefmod:Catalyze: Permanently increase this card's damage by 1 and exhaust it.

chefmod:ResearchResults.NAME: Research Results
chefmod:ResearchResults.DESCRIPTION: For X turns, add a *Random *Potion card to your hand. NL Exhaust
chefmod:ResearchResults.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: For X turns, add a *Random *Potion card to your hand.

chefmod:Shovel.NAME: Shovel
chefmod:Shovel.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Shuffle a *Reagent card into your draw pile.

chefmod:Smokescreen.NAME: Smokescreen
chefmod:Smokescreen.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL chefmod:Catalyze: Draw a card.

chefmod:SpecialFormula.NAME: Special Formula
chefmod:SpecialFormula.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random potions to use. NL Exhaust

chefmod:TestFormula.NAME: Test Formula
chefmod:TestFormula.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of !M! random chefmod:Tonics to use immediately.

chefmod:TestSubject.NAME: Test Subject
chefmod:TestSubject.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL chefmod:Catalyze: Apply !M! chefmod:Infection.

chefmod:TheFinalStraw.NAME: The Final Straw
chefmod:TheFinalStraw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy for every 0-cost card used this turn.
chefmod:TheFinalStraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to a random enemy for every 0-cost card used this combat.

chefmod:Transmute.NAME: Transmute
chefmod:Transmute.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Fatal: Choose 1 of 3 random potions to obtain. NL Exhaust

chefmod:TwoForOne.NAME: Two For One
chefmod:TwoForOne.DESCRIPTION: Obtain another copy of the next Potion you use. NL Exhaust

chefmod:UnstableFormula.NAME: Unstable Formula
chefmod:UnstableFormula.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL Next turn, deal !D! Damage.

chefmod:VolatileSolution.NAME: Volatile Solution
chefmod:VolatileSolution.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. No cards will trigger their chefmod:Catalyze effects this turn.

chefmod:WizBang.NAME: Wiz Bang
chefmod:WizBang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage 2 times. NL chefmod:Catalyze: 3 times.

chefmod:Prototype.NAME: Prototype Potion
chefmod:Prototype.DESCRIPTION: Has various effects based on the Reagents collected.

chefmod:Reaction.NAME: Reaction
chefmod:Reaction.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When drawn, gain [E] and draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust

chefmod:Distill.NAME: Distill
chefmod:Distill.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Brew your rightmost chefmod:Reagent into a potion over 3 turns. NL Exhaust

chefmod:ReagentCard.NAME: Reagent
chefmod:ReagentCard.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 random chefmod:Reagents to collect. NL Exhaust
